Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product is truly exceptional, offering unparalleled value and functionality. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth every penny of its $12,000 value to us. Considering its worth to you, we're offering it to you today for $11,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that combines both functionality and prestige. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and bring immense value to your life or business. Please let us know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
